title: User can change positioning of Favorite Teams
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And they have previously selected multiple Favorite Teams
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the "Favorite Teams" section, the teams will be listed in the order they were previously selected
custom_expected:
Then the user can tap and hold the icon on the right to drag a Favorite Team up or down in the list of Favorite Teams
And the teams will be listed in the newly selected positioning in the Favorite Teams section
And the teams will be listed in the newly selected positioning in the Navigation Menu

title: List of Favorite Teams in Navigation Menu matches Favorite Teams section
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And they have previously selected multiple Favorite Teams
custom_steps: When the user opens the Navigation Menu
custom_expected:
Then their previously selected Favorite Teams will be listed as the first option(s) in the Navigation Menu
And the list of Favorite Teams in the Navigation Menu will match the list in the Favorite Teams section in Settings
And the order of Favorite Teams in the Navigation Menu will match the order in the Favorite Teams section in Settings

title: Team settings saved when app backgrounded
custom_preconds: Favorite Teams have been previously selected
custom_steps: When the app is placed in the background and then in the foreground
custom_expected: Then the favorite teams previously selected shall remain the same in the settings

title: Team settings saved when app killed
custom_preconds: Favorite Teams have been previously selected
custom_steps: When the app is killed and then relaunched
custom_expected: Then the favorite teams previously selected shall remain the same in the settings

title: Select By Affiliate
custom_preconds:
Given the user has tapped the "Settings" section in the Navigation Menu
And has tapped the "Favorite Team" section
custom_steps: When the user taps "Select By Affiliate"
custom_expected: Then the user will be given a list of MLB teams (previously selected favorite teams will appear at the top)

title: MLB team
custom_preconds:
Given the user has tapped the "Settings" section in the Navigation Menu
And has tapped the "Favorite Team" section
And the user taps "Select By Affiliate"
custom_steps: When the user taps an MLB team
custom_expected:
Then it will all be added as Favorite Teams (indicated by a star in selected state)
And the user will see the following toast message: "All [MLB nickname] affiliates added to Favorites." E.G.: "All Ray affiliates added to Favorites."
And their Minor League teams will be displayed at the top (user must scroll to the top)

title: Team Page's Standings
custom_preconds:
Given the user has tapped the "Settings" section in the Navigation Menu
And has selected "Favorite Team(s)"
And navigates to Team pages of favorite team(s) selected
custom_steps: When the user views the Team Page's Standings
custom_expected: Then the team(s) will be indicated as a favorite in the Team Page's Standings with it being listed in bold

title: Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
Given the user has tapped the "Settings" section in the Navigation Menu
And has already selected "Favorite Team(s)"
custom_steps: When the user views the Scoreboard (accessed from the main nav)
custom_expected: Then the team(s) will be indicated as a favorite in the Daily Scoreboard with a "star" next to their name

title: Teams
custom_preconds:
Given the user has tapped the "Settings" section in the Navigation Menu
And has already selected "Favorite Team(s)"
custom_steps: When the user views the Teams (accessed from the main nav)
custom_expected: Then the team(s) will be indicated as a favorite in the Teams with a "star" next to their name and by being listed as the first team(s) at the top

title: Notifications
custom_preconds:
Given the user has tapped the "Settings" section in the Navigation Menu
And has already selected "Favorite Team(s)"
custom_steps: When the user views the notifications (either from Settings or Team Page's Settings)
custom_expected: Then the favorite team will be indicated by a star

title: Selecting a class
custom_preconds:
Given the user has tapped the "Settings" section in the Navigation Menu
And has tapped the "Favorite Team" section
custom_steps:
When the user selects a class, test for every Class:

Triple-A
Double-A
Class A Advanced
Class A Full Season
Class A Short Season
Rookie
custom_expected: Then the user will be given a list of all teams within that class (previously selected favorite teams will appear at the top)

title: Selecting a team
custom_preconds:
Given the user has tapped the "Settings" section in the Navigation Menu
And has tapped the "Favorite Team" section



Test for every Class:

Triple-A
Double-A
Class A Advanced
Class A Full Season
Class A Short Season
Rookie
custom_steps: When the user chooses a team
custom_expected:
Then the team will be added to the list of favorites (indicated by a star in selected state)
And the user will see the following toast message: "[Club CITY Name] added to Favorites." e.g.: "Lehigh Valley added to Favorites."
And their Minor League teams will be displayed at the top (user must scroll to the top)

title: Selected 'Star' Icon
custom_preconds:
Given the user has previously selected a Favorite team by Affiliate
and navigates to the "Favorite Teams" section
custom_steps:
When the user taps on Select by Affiliate
OR
When the user taps on a Class (i.e. Triple-A, Rookie, etc....)

* test both scenarios
custom_expected: Then the user sees their previously selected Favorite Team with the "Star" next to their name in a selected state

title: Views the Teams
custom_preconds:
Given the user has previously selected a Favorite team by Affiliate
and navigates to the "Favorite Teams" section
and taps on Select by Affiliate
and the user sees their previously selected Favorite Team with the "Star" next to their name in a selected state

OR

Given the user has previously selected a Favorite team by Affiliate
and navigates to the "Favorite Teams" section
and taps on a class (i.e. Triple-A, Rookie, etc....)
and the user sees their previously selected Favorite Team with the "Star" next to their name in a selected state
custom_steps:
When the user removes a favorite team
AND views the Teams (accessed from the main nav)
custom_expected: THEN the teams will NOT be indicated as a favorite in the Teams with a "star" next to their name

custom_preconds:

and navigates to the "Favorite Teams" section
and taps on Select by Affiliate
and the user sees their previously selected Favorite Team with the "Star" next to their name in a selected state

OR

and navigates to the "Favorite Teams" section
and taps on a class (i.e. Triple-A, Rookie, etc....)
and the user sees their previously selected Favorite Team with the "Star" next to their name in a selected state
custom_steps:
When the user removes a favorite team
AND views the Scoreboard (accessed from the main nav)
custom_expected: Then the teams will NOT be indicated as a favorite in the Daily Scoreboard with a "star" next to their name

title: Swiping on a Team
custom_preconds:
Given the user has previously selected a Favorite team
And has navigated to the "Favorite Teams" section
custom_steps: When the user swipes either left or right on a favorite team
custom_expected: Then the selected Favorite Team will have been removed

title: Selecting by Affiliate, then Swiping on a Team
custom_preconds:
Given the user has previously selected a Favorite team
And has navigated to the "Favorite Teams" section
custom_steps: When the user selects by Affiliate and the user swipes either left or right on the team
custom_expected:
Then all Favorite Teams will have been removed
and all the star icons will no longer be displayed in a selected state

title: Notifications
custom_preconds: Given the user is in Settings
custom_steps: When the user taps on Notifications
custom_expected:
Then the user is taken to the Notifications page which contains:
- Notification
- Sound
- MiLB News
- Teams (Home Game Reminders, Game Start, Game End, Scoring Plays, and Lead Change)

title: All Notifications toggled OFF
custom_preconds: Given the user is in Settings
custom_steps: When the user is on the Notifications page and toggles off all the notifications
custom_expected: Then the user should not receive any notification

title: Certain Notifications toggled OFF
custom_preconds: Given the user is in Settings
custom_steps: When the user is on the Notifications page and toggles off certain notifications
custom_expected: Then the user will not receive the notifications toggled off

title: All Notifications toggled ON
custom_preconds: Given the user is in Settings
custom_steps: When the user is on the Notifications page and toggles on all notifications
custom_expected: Then the user will receive all the notifications

title: Certain Notifications toggled ON
custom_preconds: Given the user is in Settings
custom_steps: When the user is on the Notifications page and toggles on certain notifications
custom_expected: Then the user will only receive the notifications toggled

title: Notifications selected and app placed in background
custom_preconds: Given Notifications have been previously selected
custom_steps: When the app is placed in the background and then in the foreground
custom_expected: Then the notifications previously selected shall remain the same in the settings

title: Notifications selected and app killed
custom_preconds: Given Notifications have been previously selected
custom_steps: When the app is killed and then relaunched
custom_expected: Then the notifications previously selected shall remain the same in the settings

title: Notifications deselected and app placed in background
custom_preconds: Given Notifications have been previously de-selected
custom_steps: When the app is placed in the background and then in the foreground
custom_expected: Then the notifications previously de-selected shall remain the same in the settings

title: Notifications deselected and app killed
custom_preconds: Given notifications have been previously de-selected
custom_steps: When the app is killed and then relaunched
custom_expected: Then the notifications previously de-selected shall remain the same in the settings

title: Scoreboard Refresh Rate
custom_preconds: Given the user is in Settings
custom_steps: When the user taps on Scoreboard Refresh Rate
custom_expected:
Then the user is presented with a pop-up of the Scoreboard Refresh Rate which contains:
- 15 Seconds
- 30 Seconds
- 1 Minute

title: MiLB.tv Login_MIAN-537
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the app
And has not accessed MiLB.tv previously
custom_steps: When the user navigates to Settings and select MiLB.com Account
custom_expected: Then the user will get prompted MiLB.com Account login screen

title: Notifications
custom_preconds: User is in Settings

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on Notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user is taken to the Notifications page which contains:
- Notification
- Sound
- MiLB News
- Teams (Home Game Reminders, Game Start, Game End, Scoring Plays, and Lead Change)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on the Notifications page and toggles off all the notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should not receive any notification

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on the Notifications page and toggles off certain the notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will not receive the notifications toggled off

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on the Notifications page and toggles on all notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will receive all the notifications

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on the Notifications page and toggles on certain notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will only receive the notifications toggled

custom_steps_separated.content: When the app is placed in the background then placed in the foreground or killed and then relaunched
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the notifications settings previously set shall remain the same

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the notifications (either from Settings or Team Page's Settings)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the favorite team will be indicated by a star

title: User removes a favorite team by Affiliate
custom_preconds:
Given the user has previously selected a Favorite team by Affiliate
and navigates to the "Favorite Teams" section
and taps on Select by Affiliate
and the user sees their previously selected Favorite Team with the "Star" next to their name in a selected state

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user can taps that selected "Star" icon
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the team is removed as a Favorite and the icon will no longer be displayed in a selected state
and will see a toast message stating: All [MLB nickname] affiliates removed from Favorites." E.G.: "All Ray affiliates removed from Favorites."
And the team(s) will no longer be displayed above all other teams in the "Favorite Team" section

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Teams (accessed from the main nav)
custom_steps_separated.expected: And the teams will NOT be indicated as a favorite in the Teams with a "star" next to their name

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Scoreboard (accessed from the main nav)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the teams will NOT be indicated as a favorite in the Daily Scoreboard with a "star" next to their name

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Team Page's Standings
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the teams will NOT be indicated as a favorite in the Standings tab by being listed in bold

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the notifications (either from Settings or Team Page's Settings)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the teams will be not have a star

title: User removes a favorite team by Class
custom_preconds:
Given the user has previously selected a Favorite team by Affiliate
and navigates to the "Favorite Teams" section
and taps on a class (i.e. Triple-A, Rookie, etc....)
and the user sees their previously selected Favorite Team with the "Star" next to their name in a selected state

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user can taps that selected "Star" icon
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the team is removed as a Favorite and the icon will no longer be displayed in a selected state
and will see a toast message stating: [Club CITY Name] removed from Favorites." e.g.: "Lehigh Valley removed from Favorites."
And the team will no longer be displayed above all other teams in the "Favorite Team" section

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Teams (accessed from the main nav)
custom_steps_separated.expected: And the teams will NOT be indicated as a favorite in the Teams with a "star" next to their name

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Scoreboard (accessed from the main nav)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the teams will NOT be indicated as a favorite in the Daily Scoreboard with a "star" next to their name

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Team Page's Standings
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the teams will NOT be indicated as a favorite in the Standings tab by being listed in bold

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the notifications (either from Settings or Team Page's Settings)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the team will be not have a star

title: User taps "Clear Favorite Teams" button
custom_preconds:
Given the user has previously selected a Favorite team
And has navigated to the "Favorite Teams" section

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the "Clear Favorite Teams" button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then all Favorite Teams will have been removed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user selects either by Affiliate or a Class
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then all the star icons will no longer be displayed in a selected state

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Teams (accessed from the main nav)
custom_steps_separated.expected: And the team(s) will NOT be have a 'star' next to their name in Teams

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Scoreboard (accessed from the main nav)
custom_steps_separated.expected: And the team(s) will NOT have a "star" next to their name in the Daily Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Team Page's Standings
custom_steps_separated.expected: And the team(s) will NOT be listed in bold in the Standings tab

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the notifications (either from Settings or Team Page's Settings)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the team will not have a star

title: User removes by swiping
custom_preconds:
Given the user has previously selected a Favorite team
And has navigated to the "Favorite Teams" section

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user swipes either left or right on the team
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then all Favorite Teams will have been removed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user selects either by Affiliate or a Class and the user swipes either left or right on the team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then all Favorite Teams will have been removed
and all the star icons will no longer be displayed in a selected state

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Teams (accessed from the main nav)
custom_steps_separated.expected: And the team(s) will NOT be have a 'star' next to their name in Teams

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Scoreboard (accessed from the main nav)
custom_steps_separated.expected: And the team(s) will NOT have a "star" next to their name in the Daily Scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Team Page's Standings
custom_steps_separated.expected: And the team(s) will NOT be listed in bold in the Standings tab

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the notifications (either from Settings or Team Page's Settings)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the team will not have a star
